Directives

The following is a list of Angular directives provided by the Blackbaud Sky UI JavaScript library. This library is for use in conjunction with the Blackbaud Sky UI Sass library. Both are available via Blackbaud's NuGet repository.

Dependencies

The Sky UI JavaScript library requires the following 3rd-party libraries. Other libraries are required for some directives but are not required if the directive is not actually used. Any additional dependencies are cited in the individual directive documentation.

  • jQuery (2.1.0 or higher) - Must be included before AngularJS
  • AngularJS (1.3.2 or higher)
  • Angular UI Bootstrap (0.12.0 or higher)
  • Moment.js (2.8.4 or higher) A library used for various date functions throughout Sky.

Many more useful directives exist in the Angular UI Bootstrap library, and some of the directives in Sky are meant to enhance directives in this library.
